text: Vasconcellea horovitziana is a species of plant in the family Caricaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forest. It is threatened by habitat loss. It was formerly placed in genus Carica. ==References== horovitziana Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Vasconcellea horovitziana
